main_address_raw_text: 江苏省苏州市相城区元和街道元和科技园钰航路398号
generated_description: su zhou du er zhi yang she bei you xian gong si, also known as suzhou du er zhi yang she bei you xian gong si, is a private, high-tech enterprise based in suzhou, jiangsu. the company specializes in the research, development, design, manufacturing, sales, and service of various industrial gas and low-temperature equipment. their main products include vpsa (vacuum pressure swing adsorption) oxygen generators, psa (pressure swing adsorption) nitrogen generators, and gas purification systems. the company holds several licenses, including a1a2a3d class pressure vessel design licenses, d1d2 class pressure vessel manufacturing licenses, and gc2 class pressure pipeline design and installation licenses. they are certified under iso9001 quality management system and iso14001 environmental management system. suzhou du er zhi yang she bei you xian gong si focuses on providing efficient and reliable oxygen generation solutions, utilizing advanced lithium adsorbent technology and unique airflow distribution designs.
